strings.string: Pick a method for turning off your display
Not all 'Display methods' work on every system. Carefully test.
- CEC methods require CEC device support. Check vendor manual.
- No Signal method disables video signal. Device may go to sleep or turn off.
- DPMS methods make use of VESA DPMS capabilities of your monitor.
Press HOME or BACK key on remote to return from screen saver.
NOTE: Not every device can be powered on automatically.
No Signal on Raspberry Pi (using vcgencmd)
Pick a method for turning off your system
Don't change this unless you know exactly what you are doing.
Useful in case you have parental controls enabled.
Ensure no audio is produced inadvertently, e.g. when using A/V receiver.
